classSpec.desc: groups those elements which contain a single reading, other than the lemma, within a textual variation.
所匯集的元素包含在原文變異中除了主題之外的對應本。
groups elements which mark the beginning or ending of a fragmentary manuscript or other witness.
所匯集的元素標記出零散手稿的起始或結尾，或其他版本。
attributes for elements which mark the beginning or ending of a fragmentary manuscript or other witness.
提供元素的屬性，這些元素標記岀零散手稿的起始、結尾或其他版本。

attDef.desc: contains a list of one or more sigla indicating the witnesses which begin or end at this point.
一個或多個印記列表，指出於此處開始或結束的版本。
attDef.valDesc: A space-delimited series of sigla; each sigil should correspond to a witness or witness group and occur as the value of the xml:id attribute on a witness element elsewhere in the document.
一個限定空間的系列印記；每個印記應與一個或一組版本相符合，並在文件其他地方作為元素witness裡的屬性xml:id的屬性值。

classSpec.desc: defines a set of attributes common to all elements representing variant readings in text critical work.
定義在文件評論作品中，所有標記變異對應本的元素可用的一套屬性。

attDef.desc: contains a list of one or more pointers indicating the witnesses which attest to a given reading.
包含一個或多個指標的一份列表，連結到已知對應本的版本。
attDef.valDesc: A space-delimited series of sigla; each sigil should correspond to a witness or witness group and occur as the value of the xml:id attribute on a witness element elsewhere in the document.
一個限定空間的系列印記；每個印記應與一個或一組版本相符合，並在文件其他地方作為元素witness裡的屬性xml:id的屬性值。

attDef.desc: classifies the reading according to some useful typology.
用合宜的分類法將對應本分類。

valItem.gloss: the reading offers a substantive variant.
對應本提供一個獨立變異。
the reading differs only orthographically, not in substance, from other readings.
該對應本僅於拼字法上與其他對應本不同，大致上維持不變。

attDef.desc: classifies the cause for the variant reading, according to any appropriate typology of possible origins.
利用可能來源的任何適當分類法，將變異對應本的產生原因分類。
provides a number indicating the position of this reading in a sequence, when there is reason to presume a sequence to the variants on any one lemma.
當有理由假設任一主題的一系列變異對應本時，則提供一個數字，指出此對應本於連續系列中的位置。
attDef.valDesc: a positive integer
一個正整數

attDef.desc: identifies the editor responsible for asserting a particular reading in the witness.
指出負責在版本中插入一特定對應本的編者。
attDef.valDesc: A pointer to an element in the document header that is associated with a person asserted as responsible for some aspect of the text's creation, transcription, editing, or encoding (see chapter ).
一個指標，連結到文件標頭裡的元素，表示在文件建立、轉錄、編輯、或編碼等某方面的負責人 (見章節)。

attDef.desc: signifies the hand responsible for a particular reading in the witness.
指出該版本中特定對應本的負責人。
attDef.valDesc: must be one of the hand identifiers declared in the document header (see section ).
必須是文件標頭裡宣告的人員識別符碼之一 (見章節 )。

elementSpec.desc: contains one entry in a critical apparatus, with an optional lemma and at least one reading.
一項學術編輯註解，內含一個不必備主題以及至少一個對應本。

attDef.desc: classifies the variation contained in this element according to some convenient typology.
利用合適的分類法將此元素所標記的變異分類。
attDef.valDesc: Any convenient descriptive word or phrase, describing the extent of the variation (e.g. word, phrase, punctuation, etc.) its text-critical significance (e.g. significant, accidental, unclear), or the nature of the variation or the principles required to understand it (e.g. lectio difficilior, usus auctoris, etc.)
任何合宜的敘述性文字，描述變異的程度 (例如字、詞、標點符號等。)、文件評論重要性 (例如重要、次要、不明)、或變異性質或理解原則(例如lectio difficilior、usus auctoris等。)

attDef.desc: identifies the beginning of the lemma in the base text, if necessary.
必要情況下，指出基礎文件中該主題的開端。
attDef.valDesc: any valid identifier
任何有效識別符碼

attDef.desc: identifies the endpoint of the lemma in the base text, if necessary.
必要情況下，指出基礎文件中該主題的結尾。
attDef.valDesc: any valid identifier
任何有效識別符碼

attDef.desc: indicates the location of the variation, when the location-referenced method of apparatus markup is used.
使用學術編輯註解標記的位置參照辦法時，指出變異的位置。
attDef.valDesc: Any string containing a canonical reference for the passage to which the variation applies.
包含一個標準參照的字串，表示變異的段落。

elementSpec.desc: contains the lemma, or base text, of a textual variation.
包含一個原文變異的主題或基礎文件。
contains a single reading within a textual variation.
包含原文變異中的一個對應本。
within a textual variation, groups two or more readings perceived to have a genetic relationship or other affinity.
原文變異中，匯集兩個或多個認為具有根源關係或於其他方面性質類似的對應本。
gives further information about a particular witness, or witnesses, to a particular reading.
進一步提供一個特殊對應本的特殊版本資訊。

attDef.desc: indicates the identifier for the reading, or readings, to which the witness detail refers.
指出版本細節資訊所參照的一個或多個對應本的識別符碼。
attDef.valDesc: the identifier of the reading or readings.
一個或多個對應本的識別符碼。

attDef.desc: identifies the individual responsible for identifying the witness
說明負責辨識版本的人員。
attDef.valDesc: a pointer to one of the identifiers declared in the document header, associated with a person asserted as responsible for some aspect of the text's creation, transcription, editing, or encoding
一個指標，連結到文件標頭裡宣告的識別符碼，表示在文件建立、轉錄、編輯、或編碼等某方面的負責人。

attDef.desc: indicates the sigil or sigla for the witnesses to which the detail refers.
標明細節資訊所指版本的一個或多個印記。
attDef.valDesc: the identifier of the sigil or sigla.
一個或多個印記的識別符碼。

attDef.desc: describes the type of information given about the witness.
版本的資訊種類。
attDef.valDesc: Values can be taken from any convenient typology of annotation suitable to the work in hand; e.g. letter form, ornament, …
屬性值可從任何適合的註解分類中取得。

elementSpec.desc: contains a list of one or more sigla of witnesses attesting a given reading, in a textual variation.
原文變異中，表明已知對應本版本的一個或多個印記的列表。
contains a list of all the witnesses referred to in wit elements or wit attributes within the critical apparatus.
包含一份所有版本的列表，這些版本在學術編輯註解中的元素wit或屬性wit內指明。
contains either a description of a single witness referred to within the critical apparatus, or a list of witnesses which is to be referred to by a single sigil.
包含學術編輯註解中所指的單一版本描述，或由一個印記所參照的版本列表。

attDef.desc: indicates which other witnesses are included in a witness group.
指出哪些其他版本包括在版本群組中。
attDef.valDesc: A space-delimited series of sigla; each sigil should correspond to a witness, and should occur as the value of the xml:id attribute on a witness element, typically in the header of the document.
一個限定空間的系列印記；每個印記應與一個或一組版本相符合，並作為元素witness裡的屬性xml:id的屬性值，通常位於文件標頭中。

elementSpec.desc: indicates the beginning, or resumption, of the text of a fragmentary witness.
指明零散版本文字的開端或重新開始。
indicates the end, or suspension, of the text of a fragmentary witness.
指明零散版本文字的結尾或中止。
indicates the beginning of a lacuna in the text of a mostly complete textual witness.
指出於大致完整的文字版本中，一個缺文的開始。
indicates the end of a lacuna in a mostly complete textual witness.
指出於大致完整的文字版本中，一個缺文的結束。
